heading: **Detailed 1:**
description: A few sunny breaks, then mostly cloudy, with a few localized morning showers. A good chance of afternoon showers or thunderstorms. Highs in the 70s, some warmer valleys west near 80. Light winds, becoming south up to 10 mph.

heading: **Detailed 2:**
description: Scattered to numerous evening showers or a thunderstorm, diminishing. Mostly cloudy, with some partial clearing and patchy fog late. Lows in the upper 50s to mid 60s. Winds south up to 10 mph this evening, then light and variable.

heading: **Detailed 3:**
description: Any patchy low clouds and fog early giving way to sun, mixed with clouds. An isolated shower possible, mainly northeast. Highs in the upper 70s to 80 east, 80 to 85 west. Light winds, becoming south up to 10 mph.

heading: **Detailed 4:**
description: Mostly clear, with some patches low clouds and valley fog, mainly east of the Green Mountains. Lows in the upper 50s to low 60s, mid 60s in the warmer valleys west. Winds light and variable.

heading: **Detailed 5:**
description:
Sunshine, mixing with clouds. Warm, and somewhat humid. Highs in the 80s. Winds light and variable.
